snippet.title: Aeon Wars: Maschinen Crisis Pre-Alpha Gameplay Footage
snippet.description:
Here's a short gameplay footage video of a Pre (pre!!) Alpha build of Aeon Wars. 
You can try this build from February 2nd to 6th, 2023, by signing up for our Open Pre-Pre Alpha Playtest on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1939280/Aeon_Wars_Maschinen_Crisis/

You'll get a taste of what we're trying to achieve which is bringing all the good stuff from tabletop wargame to video game. Meaning awesome miniatures, handcrafted diorama-style terrains but all this fully animated, with full immersive videogame experience!

Playtest the game, give us feedback or your ideas on the digital future of wargaming.
Our Discord: https://discord.gg/invite/Fqh8p9CC67
